items.sentence: I\'m beginning to suspect that\'s not going to happen.
Tom\'s house is at least three times larger than mine.
Tom\'s mother often left him alone when he was a baby.
All three of our daughters will be here for Christmas.
Before doing that, you need to ask Tom for permission.
Could you make sure Tom remembers to bring a swimsuit?
Did you break up with Tom or did he break up with you?
I thought the woman I met yesterday was Tom\'s mother.
They said they were dissatisfied with their low wages.
They think that Tom followed Mary home and killed her.
